As an alternative u can use ffmpegx to convert to a .mov file and burn that in Toast instead.

When adding the serial number, if the 'Continue Button dosen't become active, try this.

After you draged the TT10 folder into the Apps Directory, and you try to enter the Serial but can't continue, shut down TT10.

Go to the desktop
Open the TT10 folder on the desktop
(not the one you've draged into Application)( you will need to find the original downloaded DMG file and reopen it to the desk top)
CLick on Toast Titanium (TT10) ( You will get a warning it's not the optimal way to run TT10)
Go through the process of installing, when you come to the serial number just add it as before, you now should be able to continue this time.  
Complete the install.

Now shut down TT10 that is open 

Go to your Application folder
open TT10 Folder 
Start TT10
Check under the menue bar TT10 About TT10
It should be registered to you.

Done
